tool.name: anvi-show-misc-data
tool.description: Show all misc data keys in all misc data tables

param.name: input_pan_or_profile_db
param.label: Pan Or Profile Db
param.help: Anvi'o pan or profile database (and even genes database in appropriate contexts).

param.name: target_data_table
param.label: Target Data Table
param.help: The target table is the table you are interested in accessing. Currently it can be 'items','layers', or 'layer_orders'. Please see most up-to-date online documentation for more information.

param.name: target_data_group
param.label: Target Data Group
param.help: Data group to focus. Anvi'o misc data tables support associating a set of data keys with a data group. If you have no idea what this is, then probably you don't need it, and anvi'o will take care of you. Note: this flag is IRRELEVANT if you are working with additioanl order data tables.

tool.help:
usage: anvi-show-misc-data [-h] -p PAN_OR_PROFILE_DB [-t NAME] [-D NAME]
Show all misc data keys in all misc data tables
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -p PAN_OR_PROFILE_DB, --pan-or-profile-db PAN_OR_PROFILE_DB Anvi'o pan or profile database (and even genes database in appropriate contexts). -t NAME, --target-data-table NAME The target table is the table you are interested in accessing. Currently it can be 'items','layers', or 'layer_orders'. Please see most up-to-date online documentation for more information. -D NAME, --target-data-group NAME Data group to focus. Anvi'o misc data tables support associating a set of data keys with a data group. If you have no idea what this is, then probably you don't need it, and anvi'o will take care of you. Note: this flag is IRRELEVANT if you are working with additioanl order data tables.
